is_zero_of_subsingleton:
@[to_additive]
theorem is_zero_of_subsingleton (G : CommGroup) [subsingleton G] : is_zero G :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun X => ⟨⟨⟨1⟩, fun f => _⟩⟩, fun X => ⟨⟨⟨1⟩, fun f => _⟩⟩⟩
  · ext
    have : x = 1 := subsingleton.elim _ _
    rw [this, map_one, map_one]
  · ext
    apply subsingleton.elim
#align is_zero_of_subsingleton is_zero_of_subsingleton
